auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.
auth.isNotSupportedForThisRoute: is not supported for this route. Supported methods:
auth.cantConnectToLocalMySQL: Can't connect to local MySQL server
auth.mySQLRanOutMemory: MySQL client ran out of memory
auth.lostConnectionToMySQLQuery: Lost connection to MySQL server during query
